metadata.synopsis: A carefree canine gets a taste of the rough life after his owner's boyfriend throws him out of the house.

reviews: The most interesting aspect is Rodney Dangerfield's transformation into a cartoon character.
the story is quite entertaining and provides so much of the film's appeal that the artwork just wags along with it
One of the worst animated films ever, even if you are a fan of Dangerfield.
This movie gets no respect - and doesn't deserve any.
critic: Cherryl Dawson and Leigh Ann Palone
